name: Edimax EW-7822PIC 802.11a/b/g/n/ac PCIe x1 Wi-Fi Adapter
Features: [Super High-Speed AC1200 Dual-Band Wi-Fi: Next generation AC1200 Wi-Fi for HD streaming and gaming with transfer speeds up to 300Mbps (2.4GHz) or 867Mbps (5GHz), Long Range: High-output power design with high-gain antennas to penetrate walls for better Wi-Fi performance, Ideal for Gaming PCs: Instant Wi-Fi upgrade for your desktop. High-speed AC1200 Wi-Fi without inconvenient cables, Flexible Installation & Placement: Low profile bracket included and magnetic antenna stand for flexible antenna positioning]
